state_analysis: The GLPK Integer Optimizer is still processing the integer optimization. The output indicates that the optimization is ongoing with no completion yet. The command to extract the objective value has not executed successfully due to the absence of the solution file.
explanation: We will continue to allow the GLPK optimizer to finish executing. Once it completes and produces the 'solution.txt' file, we will run the command to extract the integer part of the objective value from that file.
